alert.note: Alert for Andrews; Dawson; Gaines; Martin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 9:28PM CST until February 16 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Andrews County in western Texas... Southeastern Gaines County in western Texas... Martin County in western Texas... Dawson County in western Texas... * Until 1030 PM CST. * At 928 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles north of Midland, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lamesa, Ackerly, Stanton, Lenorah, Lamesa Municipal Airport, Welch, Los Ybanez, Tarzan, Sparenberg, Punkin Center, Patricia, Arvana, Hancock, Courtney, Tenmile, Stanton Municipal Aiport, Key and Klondike. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 151 and 162. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
